Name: DON'T STOP, YOU'LL DIE!
About the game: DON'T STOP, YOU'LL DIE is a top-down arena shooter with bullet hell and roguelike elements where if you stop moving you DIE! Play as Mark the Merc, a trigger happy dude trying to survive against strange lookin' aliens. Collect coins, buy items and weapons to better equip yourself against the challenging bullet frenzied hordes that await you! Key Features Fast-paced gameplay! Heaps of bullets, everywhere... like, EVERYWHERE! Randomised waves of enemies Quick, but challenging runs! A bunch of items and weapons to choose from! Shotgun goes BOOF! Nostalgic pixel art graphics
